plot: Follow the adventures of two cocktail enthusiasts, Pat and Billy, along with their shaker girl Amber, as they interview guests and drink their way through everything.
title: What Are Pat and Billy Drinking?
plot_es: Follow the adventures of two cocktail enthusiasts, Pat and Billy, along with their shaker girl Amber, as they interview guests and drink their way through everything.
original_name: What Are Pat and Billy Drinking?
plot_en: Follow the adventures of two cocktail enthusiasts, Pat and Billy, along with their shaker girl Amber, as they interview guests and drink their way through everything.
